mapper.sql: a.id, a.service_name as "serviceName", a.service_url as "serviceUrl", a.service_logo as "logo", a.business_id as "businessId", a.sort as "sort", a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.create_by as "createBy", a.update_by as "updateBy"
mapper.select: Select ,b.deal_type as "dealType" From ad_business_service a LEFT JOIN ad_business b on a.business_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ad_business_group bg on b.id = bg.business_id LEFT JOIN ad_group g on bg.group_id = g.id join ad_user u on u.group_num = g.id where u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.id order by a.sort desc
